title: All 32 - San Francisco 49ers: Exploring possible Super Bowl hangover, pressure on Jimmy G and Kittle's contract with Matt Maiocco (Football 6/23)
description:
We all know the 49ers held a 10-point lead in the 4th quarter of the Super Bowl. We also know what happened next...Matt Maiocco of NBC Sports Bay Area joins (the returning) Will Brinson to break down the 2020 outlook for the 2019 runners-up. They discuss the possibility of Deebo Samuel missing time after suffering an injury last week (1:45), the offense compared to last year (5:00) and pressure on Jimmy Garoppolo (7:00). Matt also details what the loss of Deforest Buckner means for the team (10:00), what to expect during George Kittle's contract negotiations (14:15) and how San Fran actually gets to the mountain top this time around (18:00).
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @MaioccoNBCS
Subscribe to our Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7ZUfHFsuQcW7BkTHnXJtqw
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
